description:
Hi, everyone. I`m Tamaki!
I fell in love with Komatsu-san`s glass studio and came to work here part time.
I`m going to train really hard under Komatsu-san so I can blow glass
just like him someday. I hope you all support me...
Oh, crap! Why is there something I don`t do well around in the studio?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Tamaki-kun Toujou! Ushikou Namida no Riyuu
たまき君登場! うしこう涙の理由
